original_text: And the rest of the acts of Joram, and all that he did, are they not written in the book of the chronicles of the kings of Judah?
korean_text: 여호람의 남은 사적과 그가 행한 모든 일은 유다 왕 역대지략에 기록되지 아니하였느냐

sentences.original_text: And the rest of the acts of Joram
are they not written in the book
of the chronicles of the kings of Judah?
